AI Conference 2024.description: Join the AI revolution at this global AI conference with top experts.

Blockchain Summit 2024.description: Explore the future of finance and technology at the blockchain summit.

Tech Meetup 2024.description: A meetup for tech enthusiasts to discuss the latest trends in technology.

AI Workshop.description: Hands-on workshop to learn AI tools and techniques.

Blockchain Workshop.description: Learn how blockchain works with interactive sessions.

HTMD Conference.description: HTMD Conference is happening on Dec 07, 2024, from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM at Microsoft reactor-Lavelle Road, Bengaluru. The registration fee is $299 with 1200 attendees expected. Key topics include Technology, Innovation, and AI.

Unfold.description: Unfold 24 is Asia's largest hackathon with $100K+ worth bounties and 500+ Web3 developers. It's taking place in Whitefield, Bengaluru at the Marriott Hotel.

AI Camp.description: AI Camp is a meetup in Bengaluru focusing on AI, LLMs, ML, and Data. It's a free event with hands-on sessions.

DevOps Summit.description: DevOps India Summit is scheduled for Dec 15, 2024, from 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM at Marriott Convention Center. Registration fee is $199 with topics covering DevOps, Cloud, and Infrastructure.

Web3 Conference.description: Web3 Conference is happening on Dec 20, 2024, at Sheraton Grand, focusing on Web3, Blockchain, and DeFi. The registration fee is $249.

Gen AI.description: Gen AI hackathon is scheduled for Dec 6-8, 2024 at Thomson Reuters with 200 participants. Topics include AI, Machine Learning, and Gen AI.

ETHIndia.description: ETHINDIA is happening at KTPO, Bengaluru from Dec 6-8, 2024 with 800 participants. Prize pool of ₹35,000. Sponsored by Ethereum Foundation, Binance, and Polygon.

Cybersecurity Hackathon.description: CyberSecurity Hackathon is taking place at Pullman, Delhi from Dec 4-6, 2024. Prize pool of ₹4,50,000 with 600 participants. Sponsored by CrowdStrike, FireEye, and Cisco.

Python Bootcamp.description: Python Bootcamp is happening on Jan 15, 2024, from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM at IIIT Hyderabad. Focused on Python for Beginners, Data Analysis, and Automation. Registration is free.

IoT Summit 2024.description: IoT Summit 2024 is scheduled for Jan 18, 2024, from 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM at JW Marriott, Pune. Topics include IoT Hardware, Smart Cities, and Cloud Integration. Registration fee: ₹2,500.

FinTech Hackathon.description: FinTech Hackathon is happening from Jan 20-22, 2024, at Infosys Campus, Bengaluru. Key tracks include Digital Payments, Blockchain, and DeFi. Prize pool: ₹5,00,000.

DevCon India 2024.description: DevCon India 2024 is scheduled for Jan 25-27, 2024, at Sheraton Grand, Bangalore. Topics include Open Source, Cloud Development, and Microservices. Registration fee: ₹3,000.

Data Science Meetup.description: Data Science Meetup is happening on Jan 12, 2024, from 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM at TCS Innovation Labs, Mumbai. Focused on Data Engineering, ML Pipelines, and Deep Learning. Registration is free.

Mobile App Fest.description: Mobile App Fest is happening on Feb 1, 2024, from 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM at Infosys Pune. Tracks include Flutter, React Native, and Cross-Platform Development. Registration fee: ₹750.

Robotics Expo 2024.description: Robotics Expo 2024 is scheduled for Feb 10, 2024, from 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM at Pragati Maidan, Delhi. Showcasing the latest in Industrial Automation, Drones, and AI Robotics. Entry fee: ₹500.

Blockchain Conclave.description: Blockchain Conclave 2024 is happening on Feb 15, 2024, from 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM at The Leela, Bengaluru. Topics include Smart Contracts, DeFi, and NFTs. Registration fee: ₹1,800.

Web Development Fair.description: Web Development Fair is happening on Feb 20, 2024, from 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM at Christ University, Bangalore. Topics include Full Stack Development, Jamstack, and Web Performance. Registration fee: ₹1,000.

Cybersecurity Expo 2024.description: Cybersecurity Expo 2024 will feature the latest trends in threat detection, data protection, and security automation.

ML Bootcamp 2024.description: An intensive 3-day Machine Learning Bootcamp focusing on algorithms, real-world data, and implementation.

Web3 Development Summit.description: A conference focused on Web3 development, blockchain technology, decentralized applications, and smart contract deployment.

AI & Robotics Expo.description: AI & Robotics Expo will feature innovative robots, autonomous systems, and AI-driven applications.

IoT Connect 2024.description: Join IoT professionals for a 2-day event discussing the future of IoT in smart cities, healthcare, and connected devices.

TechEd India 2024.description: TechEd India brings together top developers, technologists, and engineers to discuss and showcase new technologies.

Cloud Summit 2024.description: A summit focused on cloud computing trends, services, security, and the future of cloud technologies.

IoT Hackathon 2024.description: A 48-hour IoT hackathon to create innovative solutions using the latest IoT technologies and sensors.

Blockchain Developers Conference.description: A conference dedicated to blockchain developers with technical sessions on smart contracts, cryptography, and decentralized applications.

ML & AI Expo 2024.description: This expo will showcase the latest in machine learning models, AI advancements, and practical implementations across industries.

Robotics Workshop 2024.description: Learn to build and program robots in this hands-on robotics workshop, focusing on automation and autonomous systems.

Cybersecurity Bootcamp.description: A 5-day immersive bootcamp to learn the essentials of ethical hacking, penetration testing, and security best practices.

Cloud Engineering Summit.description: This summit focuses on cloud engineering, architecture, migration strategies, and the best practices for working with cloud technologies.

AI Developer's Meetup.description: AI Developer's Meetup is a gathering for AI developers to exchange ideas, share challenges, and learn about the latest trends in AI development.

Ethical Hacking Workshop.description: This workshop will guide participants through ethical hacking tools, techniques, and methodologies for security professionals.

Web Development Hackathon 2024.description: A 3-day hackathon focused on building web applications using modern front-end and back-end technologies.

Digital Transformation Summit.description: This summit will discuss how digital transformation is shaping industries with case studies and expert speakers on AI, blockchain, and IoT.

Edge Computing Forum 2024.description: Join the experts as they discuss how edge computing is revolutionizing IoT, AI, and real-time processing in various sectors.

Game Dev Conference 2024.description: A conference for game developers to learn about game design, engine development, and the latest trends in game tech.

AI for Healthcare Summit.description: AI in healthcare is rapidly transforming the industry. Join experts as they discuss AI tools and applications in the medical field.

DevOps Automation Hackathon.description: A hackathon focused on automating DevOps pipelines and processes to improve productivity and efficiency in software development.

Machine Learning Hackathon 2024.description: A 48-hour hackathon to build machine learning models and solutions to solve real-world problems using AI and ML techniques.

Tech and Blockchain Conference.description: A conference on the intersection of technology and blockchain with expert talks on the latest advancements in DeFi, NFTs, and smart contracts.
